product.title: Nitro Gear - Pinion Install Kit - FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60, FJ62, FJ80 1958-2002
product.body_html: Differential: Toyota 9.5" 9-1/2" 3rd Member (with or without Electric Locker) Kit Assembly by: Nitro Gear & Axle Kit Contents: Pinion Bearings Pinion Nut Pinion Seal Crush Sleeve Pinion Depth Shims Loctite Marking Compound w/ Brush Vehicle Applications: 1958-1984 Toyota Landcruiser FJ40 & BJ40 Toyota Landcruiser FJ45 & BJ45 1967-1980 Toyota Landcruiser FJ55 1981-1987 Toyota Landcruiser FJ60 BJ60 HJ60 1988-1990 Toyota Landcruiser FJ62 1984-2010 Toyota Landcruiser 70 Series 1990-1992 Toyota Landcruiser FJ80 HJ80 (This kit suits Rear 3rd member only) 1993-1997 Toyota Landcruiser FZJ80 HZJ80 HDJ80 HDJ81 HZJ81 (This kit suits Rear 3rd member only) 1998-2002 Toyota Landcruiser FZJ105 HZJ105 (This kit suits Rear 3rd member only) 1998-2007 Toyota Landcruiser UZJ100 FZJ100 HZJ100 HDJ100 (This kit suits Rear 3rd member only) The kits assembled by Nitro Gear & Axle only uses the highest quality bearings available from Timken & Koyo. Nitro Gear & Axle does not use any cheap chinese bearings. By using only Timken & Koyo bearings just like all of the OEM vehicle manufacturers you can be assured that your differential will be reliable, durable, & quiet for years to come. Note: This product drop ships from our supplier within 5-7 business days. We do not stock these parts on our shelves. If you choose an expedited shipping option, such as 2nd day air or overnight, your package will ship via the selected method when it leaves the supplier.
